DO NOT D/L VIRUS ALL THROUGH THE TORRENT!!! I am QUITE sure it was this one (remember it by all the "kids loved it" comments). BankerFox.A and Win32/Nuqel.E all through it. Had to wipe the entire computer.
Thank you very much for this wonderful torrent! 10/10!

Guys, this is the Hayao Miyazaki film in case you dont know. The quality of the torrent is pretty good. Its only slightly, very slightly, pixelated. But the sound and english dub is great. 

For watching this movie, this is probably the best torrent. But its still not 100% DVD or high-res.
Great download, thanks!!

Thank you for this great upload. I like these types of films and I ain't gonna lie and say "My kids/children love it!" But that I actually want to watch it lol.

Quality is good 10/10.

Also @pearlz You cannot get a virus from an AVI File, So you must be mistaken. 
.AVI is not a Windows Executable file type therefore impossible for it to give you a virus.
I really like Miyazaki's work!
@superainbowprincesslol are you dumb? bigger file means lower compression, it does not mean higher resolution, you can easily see 720p films that are 4 Gb and 1080p films that are 3 Gb
great upload. thx :)
